Tigerhawk sees the Hostages problem what should I do what would a hero do?
Tigerhawk sends signals to Ramuluas Signals "I have a clear shot Signal by 
tapping your shoulder if you want me to take it. Aims at who ever has Ramhorn


Liono Laughs looks at the counter 2 minutes left "You reminded me why I fight 
a Warrior with a Cause it the most dangerous I'm fighting for myself. Besides 
I can't be a hero hiding underneath my bed." 

Dark see the right moment Push all his power into his plasma balls and 2 
fires huge plasma balls.

Liono turns into Flashing Convoy and his Chest slowly opens to show the 
Matrix as it fires a massive blue blast covering and devouring the 2 plasma 
blast and everything in it way.

Dark looking at it  "The Matrix Blaster there is no way I can Counter that 
its to big and I'm out of power " as the energy blast Devours him. Knocking 
him over.

Flashing reverts back to Liono walks towards dark "He's still alive barely 
but he's In Stasis Lock " Picks up Dark. Looks at the burned earth the as he 
Checks the Lion "It still alive" Carry the two Lio Flies back to the Maximal 
base.  "Hey Matrix where is my next journey and will I have to go it alone?"
